description: Try our easy to follow One Pot Mexican Tomato Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Weeknight dinner,Aug 2020,Sesame free,Budget,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Tomato,Peanut free
name: One Pot Mexican Tomato Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and capsicum, stirring, for 3 minutes or until softened.
Add oregano, cumin, ground coriander and paprika and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add rice and cook for 1 minute or until coated.

Stir in tomatoes, beans and 3 cups cold water and bring to boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until rice is tender. To serve, dollop over sour cream, scatter over coriander and season with pepper.
